name: 11-aloneTomeGoodEnding
commands: #bad bonds for both, senya and schuri live
Right...|Senya and Schuri...should still be alive.|I avoided killing them.
Ow...my head's killing me.|Wha..? Where's the necromancer?
It's all over now. That necromancer's dead.|The Chalice is back in our rightful hands.
I can't believe I missed the whole fight.|And...|I'm sorry.
That Lithrasir...you put it to good use.
Yeah, you sure did.|Too bad we weren't much help.
Oh Spirits..you really did a number on her!
Lilith's body is mangled on the castle floor, guts spilling out.|Perhaps I've been too excited...
A few days after conducting Sir Cyrus' funeral, we convened at Kaerndal Castle.
Ahhh...after all this I think we all deserve a break!
Agreed!|Though...I hate to be a downer but I wish I could have done more in that final battle
It wasn't your fault. You were under control.
Remember that necromancers's words?|She said something about our faith being tested or whatever.

Even so it wasn't any of you two's fault.|If anything the two of you have been tolerating my piss poor decision making this entire time.|I mean...I did take that Tome afterall.|The two of you were upset when I did.
The two of us were worried about your safety.|Though, it all worked out in the end....|I do hope you won't continue using it.
Don't be so harsh on yourself, {var:MC_name}.|We all had our moments.|And I agree with Schuri.|Who knows when that books gonna act up?
I'll...think about it.|Right now, I'll keep it safe.|Once things settle, I'll talk to Aesc.
I suppose there's no convincing you huh?|Anyways...
Schuri when are you going to tell him?
Oh I'm saying it?|Ah...Senya and I were discussing what we wanted to do and decided to go off on our own.
Huh? What do you mean?|I thought after all this...
We were going to stick together like always...
Ohhh it's not like we wouldn't keep in touch with you.|We'll send you letters.
You see Schuri and I have spoken lots about this.|It didn't just come out of nowhere.|We were both dissatisfied with how the fight played out.
But it didn't have to go that way.
We plan to work on ourselves and open our sights more to the world.|It won't be forever.
And to be honest...we're scared.|The Tome may not affect you...but it can affect us.
We know its been a big help.|But we can't help but think if the Tome played a part of why we got controlled.|We don't want things to repeat.
We don't wnant to force you to get rid of it so...
Yeah, don't worry to much.|We'll keep in touch.|We can still get together just...|not as often.
I suppose this is goodbye then.

Schuri and Senya left Kaerndal Castle the next day. I decided to stay back and fix up this place.|After all, it was where we spent most of our days. And...|To keep it tidy whenever they choose to come back.|I admit though...this Tome has been gaining some attitude.|But thanks to Aesc, it should be nothing to worry about...
Ending Achieved:|To The Ideals We Carry
